text: yqal lilkafirin yawm alqyamt: siruu 'iilaa eadhab jahanam aladhi kuntum bih tukadhibun fi aldnya, syru, fastzlu bidukhan jahanam ytfre minh thlath qte, la yuzil dhlk alzili min hurun dhlk alyawm, wala yadfae min hurun allahab shyyana. 'iina jahanam tqdhf min alnaar bisharar ezym, kl shararat minh kalbna' almshyd fi aleizm walartfae. ka'an shrr jahanam almttayr minha 'ibl sud ymyl lawnuha 'iilaa alssufrt
